success.confirmationEmailSentMessage: A confirmation email has been sent. Please check your email and click the link to complete registration.
success.passwordUpdatedMessage: Please log in with your new password.
success.resetEmailSentMessage: A password reset link has been sent.
success.resetEmailSentDetail: A password reset link has been sent to your email address. Please check your email.
success.passwordUpdateSuccess: Password has been successfully updated. Please go to the login page.
success.listCreatedMessage: Card list has been successfully created.
success.urlCopiedMessage: Link has been copied to clipboard.
success.idCopiedMessage: ID: {postId} has been copied to clipboard.

info.tradeNotice: Posts registered here will be immediately reflected on the timeline. Comments can be checked from the notification icon. Trade status can be checked in My Page trade history.
info.collageDescription: Automatically combine multiple card images to create a single collage image. You can post the generated collage on X.
info.collageInstruction: You can select 1-30 cards in each group. Titles will be displayed on the collage image.
info.loginRequired: Login required to generate and manage collages.
info.searchCardsInstruction: Please select cards from the "Search Cards" button

warning.timeSkewMessage: Your device clock is off by {formatTimeSkew}. Posting may fail.
warning.timeSkewDetail: Your device clock is off by {formatTimeSkew}. This may cause authentication issues.
